price: (ነገሩ) እንደዚሁ ነው፡፡ እነዚያን ከእነርሱ በፊት የነበሩትን ከመልክተኛ ማንም አልመጣቸውም፡፡ (እርሱ) «ድግምተኛ ወይም ዕብድ ነው» ያሉ ቢኾኑ እንጂ፡፡
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُواْ سَاحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٌ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika mā atā alladhīna min qablihim min rasūlin illā qālū sāḥirun aw majnūnun
